name: Legend of the Golden Witch
description: The first arc of Umineko no Naku Koro ni. The story begins with the Ushiromiya family gathering on the island of Rokkenjima for their annual family conference. The family is shocked when a series of mysterious murders begin to occur, with the culprit claiming to be the legendary Golden Witch Beatrice. The arc follows Battler Ushiromiya as he tries to uncover the truth behind the murders and prove that they were not committed by a witch.

name: Turn of the Golden Witch
description: The second arc of Umineko no Naku Koro ni. The story follows Battler Ushiromiya as he is once again drawn into the world of the Ushiromiya family and the mysterious Golden Witch Beatrice. This time, Battler is faced with a new challenge as he must solve the mystery of the murders while also coming to terms with his own beliefs about the existence of magic.

name: Banquet of the Golden Witch
description: The third arc of Umineko no Naku Koro ni. The story follows Battler Ushiromiya as he continues to investigate the mysterious murders on Rokkenjima and the involvement of the Golden Witch Beatrice. Battler is faced with new challenges as he must confront his own doubts and fears in order to uncover the truth behind the murders.
